{{Wireless embedded system |brand=IGNITION Design Labs |model=Portal |revision=(SAP102) |series=AC2200 |asin=B01JQROZZS |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router, mesh hub, IoT hub |fcc_id=2AFZUSAP102 |fcc_date=07/22/2016 |flags=Wave2, Bluetooth 4.1 LE, MU-MIMO, DFS (master), Zero Wait DFS, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PE69249.K7, 1540, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu2_model=QCA4531 |cpu2_cspeed=650 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q128FVSQ |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W971GG6SB-25 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PE69249.K7, 1540, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NKMJKF, E052700; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201F;RTL8201FN; |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2565T;SiGe, 2565T, 528CF;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;SKY85405, 517BL, 1517 MY;4; ,,, 1x1 DFS monitoring radio;Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9887;;1; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 552DE;1; |default_ip=192.168.8.1 }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|IgnitionHub Portal}} :{{ProductPage|https://portalwifi.com/features}} "SAP102 V1.2A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Model name might be ''Portal-PCW-110-COM'' *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33079-ignition-design-labs-portal-reviewed ''Ignition Design Labs Portal Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :'''Monitor''': Contains a Mini PCIe module with the following chips: :* [[QCA]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qca9887 QCA9887] (1x1 Dual-Band MIMO) 802.11abgn/ac :* [[QCA]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qca4531 QCA4531] (2x2 2.4GHz) 802.11b/g/n WiSoC :(QCA9531 on some revisions) :* Winbond W971GG6SB-25 128MB RAM :* Winbond W25Q128FVPQ 16MB Flash :* [[CSR]] CSR8811 Bluetooth 4.1 SoC "The empty connector between the two radios holds Portal's 'secret sauce' module (my term, not IDL's). :One of the photos in the FCC internal pictures file identifies this module as '2.4G/BT/BLE Module', :but it's much more than that. The composite photo below shows both sides of the board, which are packed with interesting goodies. :In addition to a CSR8811 Bluetooth 4.1 SoC, it also holds the Qualcomm dual-band monitor radio and :dedicated Qualcomm "SpectrumBoost" co-processor that enables Portal's 'zero-wait' DFS switching."
